detail_desc: Jumper in soft, fine knit lambswool with a round, ribbed neckline and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit trainer socks with an embroidered motif and elasticated tops.
Padded jacket in woven fabric with a detachable, faux fur-trimmed hood. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, zipped side pockets and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.

Jumper in a soft, rib-knit modal and cotton blend with a turtle neck and long sleeves. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders, tapered sleeves and a sharply tapered waist to create a flattering silhouette.
V-neck jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Lightweight jacket in a patterned, cotton crêpe weave with notch lapels, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with a tab and button. Jetted front pockets, slits in the sides and no fasteners. Unlined.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and ties at the sides.
Short, wide top in crushed velvet with a V-neck front and back.
Trousers in an airy viscose weave with an elasticated waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Long-sleeved wrapover top in ribbed jersey with a V-neck and long ties at the waist that can be wound around the body several times.
Briefs in microfibre with a high waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back. The briefs are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit.
Lace bra with non-wired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Sleeveless, knee-length dress in a sturdy viscose weave with a collar, V-neck and concealed buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets and a seam at the waist with a detachable D-ring belt. Unlined.
Knee-length coat in woven fabric with wide notch lapels, a detachable tie belt at the waist, decorative tab at the cuffs and side pockets. No buttons. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a wide, ribbed neckline and ribbing around the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a ribbed shaft and elastication around the top.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a text print and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Loafers in a sturdy jacquard weave with satin linings, imitation leather insoles and fluted soles. Heel 1.5 cm.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low, V-shaped waist and high cut at the back.
Round sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Suit trousers in woven fabric with a zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets and creases. Slim fit.
Long-sleeved top in a Tencel™ lyocell weave with a slightly wider neckline.
Short-sleeved dresses in soft, organic cotton jersey with a round neckline and a seam with a wide flounce at the hem.
Leggings in soft cotton and viscose jersey with a wide, foldover panel at the waist for a more comfortable fit.
Short-sleeved polo shirts in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidered detail on the chest and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch. Three with a print motif.
Jacket in soft fleece designed to be worn as a thermal mid layer. High collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Unlined. The jacket is made partly from recycled polyester.
Bell-shaped, pleated, calf-length skirt in woven fabric with an elasticated waist and laser-cut hem. Lined.
Fitted, knee-length dress in a patterned stretch crêpe weave with cap sleeves and a back-to-front shirt collar with an opening and buttons at the back of the neck. Unlined.
Double-layered hats in soft cotton jersey.
Short, high-waisted skirt in a textured weave with a sheen. Pleats at the top, a concealed zip at the back, and side pockets. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in soft slub cotton jersey with a chest pocket and ribbing around the neckline.
Straight-style top in soft slub jersey made from organic cotton. Round neckline with a narrow ribbed trim, and flutter sleeves.
Dress in airy, patterned modal crêpe with a round neck, seam at the waist with a decorative bow at the front, and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.

EMMA JAYNE x H&M. Dress in airy, patterned chiffon with a square neckline front and back and an opening with a shimmering button at the back of the neck. Flutter sleeves with overlocked edges that continue over the shoulders, and gathered seams with a small frill trim on the skirt. Lined.
Shirt in checked cotton flannel with a collar and chest pocket. Regular fit.
5-pocket jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Short skirt in imitation patent leather with a tab and buttons at the waist, a zip down the front and a small zipped pocket. Unlined.
Sleeveless blouse in a soft viscose weave with a narrow collar, buttons down the front and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Slingbacks in imitation suede with pointed toes and long straps that tie around the ankles. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 5.5 cm. The slingbacks are made partly from recycled polyester.
Wide jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Tunic in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Small frilled collar, an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck, long raglan sleeves, wide cuffs with a flounce and covered buttons, and a flounce at the hem. Inner tunic in a viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a Henley top and pair of leggings in organic cotton waffle jersey. Top with a button placket and long, cuffed sleeves. Leggings with covered elastication at the waist and cuffed hems.
Set with a top and leggings in cotton. Leggings in printed jersey with an elasticated waist. Sweatshirt with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket, double-layered drawstring hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fitted, calf-length dress in sturdy jersey with a sheen. Round neck, a concealed zip at the back, an asymmetric seam under the bust and a skirt with a seam and flare to the hem. Lined.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey with a unique nursing feature. The design includes a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a narrow, ribbed trim around the neckline.
Sandals in imitation leather with square toes, narrow straps that tie around the ankle and covered heels. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 4.5 cm.
Padded jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Stand-up collar, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and a zipped inner pocket. Polyester filling. Lined.
Jacket in washed cotton denim with embroidery. Collar, press-studs down the front, decorative flap front pockets with a press-stud, and cuffs with press-studs. Unlined.
Set with two ear cuffs, two non-matching hoop earrings and a small metal stud. Three pieces are decorated with glass rhinestones and one with pearly plastic beads. The zinc content is recycled.

Blouse in airy, textured-knit jersey with a stand-up collar and cut-out section at the back with ties at the back of the neck. Straight style with soft draping to the hem, and long raglan balloon sleeves with narrow, concealed elastication at the cuffs.
Calf-length dress in a knit containing some wool with a V-neck, gently dropped shoulders, ribbing at the cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.

Padded parka in sturdy fabric with a stand-up collar and detachable, pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim. Concealed zip down the front with a wind flap and visible buttons. Handwarmer pockets with a press-stud, patch front pockets at the bottom with a flap and button, a zipped sleeve pocket and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Cardigan in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a stand-up collar, press-studs down the front, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with an opening and ties at the back of the neck, long puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Jumpsuit in a woven viscose blend with a sweetheart neckline and short puff sleeves with elastication at the shoulders and a small frill trim. Wide, inset elastication at the back with a concealed zip, a high waist with pleats below, side pockets and tapered, loose-fitting legs.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a motif on the front.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Track jacket in sturdy jersey with a mesh-lined drawstring hood and a zip down the front. Long raglan sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs and mesh-lined side pockets with a taped zip. Unlined.
Shorts in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, slightly lower crotch and fake fly. Side pockets, a back pocket and knee-length legs with raw-edge hems.

Soft, non-wired bra in ribbed jersey designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin. Adjustable shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners. The polyamide content of the bra is partly recycled.
Jacket in soft pile with a stand-up collar, zip down the front and yoke at the back. Zipped chest pocket and zipped front pockets. Mesh lining.
Baby Exclusive. Cardigan in a textured organic cotton knit with a jersey lining. Zip down the front, a hood with ears and long raglan sleeves.
Wide jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a rib-knit cotton blend with a small, ribbed stand-up collar and dropped shoulders.
Fully lined bikini bottoms. Low waist with wide elastication, and a high cut at the back.
Trousers in woven fabric with one welt back pocket, a concealed zip in the side and slim legs with short slits at the hems.
Low-cut swimsuit with a cut-out section at the front, lightly padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust, and narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Lined.
Triangle bikini top with wide shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts. Cut-out sections at the sides, a wide elastic hem and a metal fastener at the back.
Swim pants with a laser-cut frilled trim at the top and narrow elastication at the waist. Lined gusset.

Oversized polo-neck jumper in a soft knit containing some wool. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing at the cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
5-pocket trousers in stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric.
Long-sleeved bodysuit in soft organic cotton jersey with a rounded collar and press-studs at the back and crotch. Scalloped edges at the collar and cuffs.
Sandals with straps at the front and a wrapover ankle strap with an adjustable fastener. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 6.5 cm.
Adjustable, glittery, on-ear headphones with padded appliqués at the top. Designed to fit mobile phones with a 3.5 mm socket. Length of wire approx. 120 cm.
Top in an airy mulberry silk weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck, short sleeves and decorative seams at the sides.
